product_overview: Focus Clinical is a healthcare web platform designed to provide users with comprehensive service information, easy appointment booking, and clinic location details, enhanced by a clean, accessible UI with soft neumorphic design principles to foster trust and engagement.
core_goals: Provide clear and accessible healthcare service information across categories and specialists.
Enable patients to book appointments easily through an interactive and validated booking system.
Enhance user trust through authentic patient testimonials showcased in a dynamic slider.
Offer seamless navigation with a sticky, responsive global header supporting desktop and mobile formats.
Ensure the UI is visually engaging and accessible with smooth scroll-triggered animations and a consistent neumorphic design system.
key_features: Sticky Global Navigation with scroll effects and a mobile-friendly burger menu.
Auto-playing Testimonial Slider featuring patient feedback with author images.
Interactive Appointment Booking System with form validation, real-time feedback, and submission simulation.
Comprehensive Service Information pages detailing healthcare services, categories, and specialists.
Location Directory presenting clinic branches with contact info and operation hours for Kerugoya and Ishiara locations.
Scroll-triggered reveal animations using Intersection Observer API to improve UX and engagement.
user_flow_summary: User lands on homepage and uses the sticky global navigation to explore site sections or open the mobile burger menu on smaller devices.
User views the testimonial slider to read about patient experiences and gains trust in the healthcare services.
User navigates to the appointments page or uses the embedded booking form on the homepage to submit an appointment request, receiving validation feedback and confirmation simulation.
User explores the service information page to understand available healthcare specialties and categories in detail.
User visits the locations page to find clinic branch information, operation hours, and contacts.
Throughout the browsing experience, user encounters subtle scroll-reveal animations that highlight content progressively enhancing interaction and focus.
validation_criteria: All navigation elements must be prominently visible, sticky to top on scroll, and fully functional across desktop and mobile devices.
Testimonial slider must autoplay smoothly, loop infinitely, and display correct author details with images.
Appointment booking forms require client-side validation for all fields, and successful submission triggers a user-friendly confirmation message.
Service and location pages must display accurate, up-to-date information consistent with clinic records.
Scroll animations must trigger correctly on entering viewport without causing layout shifts or performance issues.
UI components, including buttons, cards, inputs, and modals, must comply with the neumorphic style guidelines and accessibility standards defined in the design system master file.
Website must be responsive and accessible according to pre-delivery checklist including proper contrast, focus states, and motion reduction preferences.
